### Frequently Asked Questions

###### Is there any startup cost?

We charge a small on-boarding fee to get started with Wodify. As part of this process we’ll build out your membership templates and schedule, import all of your clients and customize your software to fit your business like a glove.

###### Is there any training for new Wodify customers?

Of course! Our premium onboarding process involves a ton of hands-on training. After we build out your software, you’ll go through our comprehensive online training module, followed by a 1 on 1 training call with one of our Customer Success Agents to ensure you’re fully equipped to run your business more efficiently than ever! We also realize that learning new software is a lot to take in, so for the first month after training you’ll receive tips, tricks, and reminders every couple days via email —  just because we want to make sure you really get the most out of your new investment!

###### How does pricing work for multiple locations?

Please [book a call](https://book.wodify.com/en/book-a-demo-wodify-core) with someone from our team to talk about special multi-location pricing.

###### Are there contracts?

Nope! There is no minimum commitment and all of our services are month to month.

###### Can I move between plans any time?

Definitely! Our goal is to work in perfect lockstep with your business and meet your needs as they arise.

###### But switching from other software is such a pain, right?

Not when you switch to Wodify! After switching thousands of customers over from other software we’ve got the formula down pat. We make everything painless with our premium onboarding process.

###### Is there a monthly payment processing fee?

With Wodify Payments, there is no monthly fee for processing. You just pay a modest transaction fee for each payment that you process.

Wodify is a CrossFit, gym, and studio management software dedicated to helping owners more efficiently manage their business. Wodify has a global presence, helping manage over 5,000 gyms and studios around the world. Originally built as CrossFit software, Wodify now also caters to functional fitness gym owners, Martial Arts studio and school owners, yoga studio owners. and many more. Some popular features are performance tracking, fitness leaderboards, Martial Art belt and level tracking, automated billing, class scheduling, digital waivers, and custom branding. Wodify customers can purchase workout programming directly through the Wodify Workout Marketplace from partners such as NCFIT Collective, Mayhem Affiliate, Deka Comp, and more.
